item.title: [GRA/BHS/DE/VA][Public Cloud] - Registries upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 16, 08:00 - 16:00 UTC

Mar 5, 23:21 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed Private Registry.

Start time : 16/04/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 16/04/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : The upgrade of the Harbor version will set Harbor in read-only mode (only pull will be allowed) for 1 or 2mn.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade of registries.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA11][Public Cloud] - Network API/Managed Kubernetes Services Incident notification
item.description:
Mar 7, 05:21 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Public cloud offer has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 06/03/2025 20:27 UTC
End time : 06/03/2025 21:50 UTC
Root cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Mar 6, 21:51 UTC
Monitoring - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service.

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Customers are able to perform API actions which involve an Openstack Network.
Slowness is no longer observed while performing API actions.
Ongoing Actions :Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Mar 6, 21:43 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service.

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Since 21:36 UTC, customers are able to perform API actions which involve an Openstack Network.
But slowness might be observed while performing API actions.
Ongoing Actions :Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Mar 6, 20:47 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Public cloud offering, which is causing temporary Availability issues in the GRA11 region.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 06/03/2025 20:27 UTC
Impacted Services : Network API
Customers Impact : Customers are not able to perform API actions which involve an Openstack Network. This includes Instance spawn, loadbalancer failover etc...
Root cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : Server load is steadily decreasing following the initial incident, and we are monitoring the region.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologise for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [GRA11][Public Cloud] - Network API/Managed Kubernetes Services Incident notification
item.description:
Mar 6, 19:07 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Public cloud offer has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 06/03/2025 04:00 UTC
End time : 06/03/2025 16:02 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Mar 6, 18:42 UTC
Update - Following analysis, our teams have determined that there has been degradation of services for Managed Kubernetes Services as well.
Our teams are currently working to restore the services.

Mar 6, 16:58 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Public cloud offering, which is causing temporary Availability issues in the GRA11 region.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 06/03/2025 04:00 UTC
Impacted Services : Network API in the GRA11 region is degraded.
Customers Impact : Actions performed for updating existing load balancers or creating new ones will result in API errors. For Network API, services are degraded or response time is increased. Current load balancers remain active.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologise for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.description:
Mar 5, 12:48 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed

Mar 4, 11:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 3, 12:53 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our 3AZ Public Cloud Beta. A AZ loss simulation is scheduled on Paris-3AZ Region to allow customers to test the resilience of OVHcloud Paris 3AZ Region.

Start time : 04/03/2025 11:00 UTC
End time : 04/03/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : This should not affect your regional services. However, this should temporarily affect availability of your zonal services if resilience mechanisms have not been anticipated.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on 3AZ Public Cloud Beta.

Thank you for your understanding.

Customers Impact : Some instance are unavailable for customers.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.
